title: Small Farm Irrigation - Video 3 - How to Plug the End of a Lay Flat Header Pipe

tasks.task: Demonstrate how to plug the end of a lay flat header pipe for irrigation.
subtasks: Verify pipe diameter compatibility with fittings and plug.
Prepare a white threaded cap with teflon tape.
Screw the capped fitting into a gray barbed fitting using a pipe wrench.
Slide a clamp onto the lay flat pipe end.
Insert the barbed cap into the pipe end, ensuring proper alignment.
Lubricate the connector if inserting is difficult.
Push the connector until the pipe is snug against the fitting.
Position the clamp at the top of the fitting.
Secure the clamp with a flat head screwdriver.
Attach drip tape to the header pipe.

tasks.task: Produce a helpful video on irrigation system installation for small farms.
subtasks: Create a video demonstrating the plugging process.
Provide viewers with further resources for learning irrigation installation.
